known_issues: "View Feedback" page fails to load (blank screen or error when accessing feedback)

existing_features.title: Add Indonesian as a supported UI language across the app by (1) adding a new language option with code "id" to the language dropdown, (2) extending the Language type to include "id", and (3) providing a full Indonesian translation entry for all existing translation keys used by the UI.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add Indonesian language option to the language menu

projectName: Add Indonesian language option to the language menu
